Headline: #94 California, #82 Kimball-Homan Temporary Northbound Reroute near Homan and Division
ShortDescription: Northbound 94 California and 82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted via Homan, Division, Cicero, Fullerton and Homan due to street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #94 California and #82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted via Homan, Division, Cicero, Fullerton and Homan due to street blockage near Homan and Division.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: No trains between Kimball and Southport
ShortDescription: Brown Line service has been temporarily suspended between Kimball and Southport due to fire department activity near Irving Park.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown Line service has been temporarily suspended between Kimball and Southport due to fire department activity near Irving Park.

As a result, trains are operating only between the Loop and Southport at this time.

Shuttle buses have been requested  between Southport and Kimball to provide connecting service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
